Description:

Some time after the events of Might & Magic Ã‚Â® Heroes Ã‚Â® VI Catral town , located on a peninsula Agin and once proudly bore the title of colony Holy Empire , now on the verge of leaving the Union.

The player will have to decide the fate of four adventurers who were involved in political machinations and landed in the midst of intrigue, weaving in Kartal . For control of the city fighting the various forces and groups , both old and newly emerging .

Gaining experience and earning fame , our heroes through their actions will determine the fate of the peninsula Agin . Demonstrating diligence , courage and heroism , they will be able to banish the ghosts of the past and to dispel the dark shadow , dangling over the future of these lands.


Features Repack: 

Release is based on the Might & Magic X - Legacy Digital Deluxe Edition *
Do not cut / no recoded
Installation time ~ 4 minutes

Additional content:

+ The Falcon and the Unicorn ( The Falcon and the Unicorn )
+ Sana the Archmage ( Archmage Zana )
+ Special Relic Set ( special set of relics )
+ Meow Dungeon ( Dungeon Meow )
+ Dream Shard Dungeon ( Dungeon Dream Shard )

Digital bonuses Bonus folder in a folder with the distribution .
